Enumeration Type Documentation

enum plDrawingProgram

Defines the unit to be used among Microsoft Office units or Xfig units.

Enumerator
PL_OFFICE 

Use Microsoft Office units.

PL_XFIG 

Use Xfig units.

enum plGraphDesignType

Indicates which parameter will be provided among (i) font size, (ii) the node size, or (iii) the paper size.

For example, if font size is porovided, then the node size and paper size will be computed automatically.

Enumerator
PL_FONT_SIZE 

Font size is provided.

PL_NODE_SIZE 

Node size is provided.

PL_PAPER_SIZE 

Paper size is provided.
